title: Samsung Galaxy S8 vs S8 Plus - 10 Things Before Buying!
description: Subscribe for my Galaxy S8 vs Galaxy S8+ Unboxing & Review!  The RED iPhone :o   Got a chance to hands on with the new Samsung Galaxy S8 and Galaxy S8 Plus which pack 5.8" and 6.2" displays with a kinda weird 18.5/9 aspect ratio and a 2960 x 1440 resolution. The Galaxy S8 features a 3,000 mAh battery while the S8+ features a 3,500 mAh battery. Both share 4GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, MicroSD card expansion, IP68 Dust/Water Resistance, Wireless Charging & Samsung's new personal assistant, Bixby.   Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:  Twitter:
